bibl.title: Revolt in Ptolemaic Egypt: Nationalism Revisited.

series.title: Recherches et Rencontres. Publications de la Faculté des Lettres de Genève.

bibl.note: Highlights the possibility of some sort of nationalist discourse in the ancient world and reasserts its potential relevance to Ptolemaic Egypt.

bibl.title: Actes du 26e Congrès international de papyrologie. Genève, 16-21 août 2010.

bibl.seg: McGing Brian, Revolt in Ptolemaic Egypt: Nationalism Revisited.

Paul Schubert (Éd.), Actes du 26e Congrès international de papyrologie. Genève, 16-21 août 2010 = Recherches et Rencontres. Publications de la Faculté des Lettres de Genève. 30 (Genève, 2012) pp. 509-516.
Highlights the possibility of some sort of nationalist discourse in the ancient world and reasserts its potential relevance to Ptolemaic Egypt.
